data.decision: When asked to produce market analysis, competitive positioning, or strategic documents, default to skeptical mode rather than optimistic mode
data.rationale: The market-analysis.md I created contained multiple patterns of startup fantasy thinking: self-rating bias, fabricated-sounding statistics, optimistic timelines, and "pitch deck language" that obscures operational reality. The user correctly called this out. Honest analysis requires starting with unknowns and gaps, not impressive-sounding claims.
alternatives: Continue producing optimistic analyses when asked
Add disclaimers but keep optimistic tone
Default to skeptical/critical mode and require explicit request for promotional content
